title: So "Mages are dominating mid lane so we're nerfing." I guess we need another tank lane right?
body:
God forbid you put a mage in the mid lane, Riot wants you to play ORNN because ORNN IS SO FUN! PLAY ORNN MID! NEED MORE TANKS MID! SION CHO SEJUANI ZAC MID!

It's literally impossible for a multi-billion dollar gaming company to be this stupid, IT IS NOT POSSIBLE. The only explanation I can come up with is that they have some employees who are working on another MOBA from inside Riot and trying to trash this one to make it look more attractive to switch to when it comes out.. it's literally the only possibility.

replies.body:
The point is to make assassins actually viable by reducing waveclear, not tanks.

Ornn is currently shit, one of the worst winrate in the game. Get off the circlejerk.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YIlVEOMa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-23T03:05:31.662+0000)
>
> The point is to make assassins actually viable by reducing waveclear, not tanks.
> 
> Ornn is currently shit, one of the worst winrate in the game. Get off the circlejerk.

If they wanted to make assassin's viable, they only thing they need to do is remove bone plating and stopwatch from the game. Problem solved.

Neither has anything to do with the fact midlane assassins get poked or pushed out of lane without contest.

Even a lot of midlane mages suffer the same problems.
